s:pt presents with 2 days history of moderate feeling of tiredness, moderate fatigue and moderate yellowing of eyes. she is a 42 yr old F interior designer. o:Height 69 in, Weight 175 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Skin = pallor, Skin = pale, no petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed mycophenolate mofetil - 500 mg daily in divided doses, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.
